name: Etherym Sacred Paradise
text: When this card is activated: you can add 1 "Etherym" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use the following effects of "Etherym Sacred Paradise" once per turn. You can send 1 card in your hand to the GY; Special Summon 1 of your banished "Etherym" monsters. You can banish 2 monsters from your GY (Quick Effect): This card is unaffected by effects your opponent controls until the end of this turn.
